name: test_simple_chat_responses[desktop-testdata0]
description:
Validate chatbot responses semantically using OpenAI embeddings.
    Also validate multilingual behavior: English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL).
descriptionHtml:
Validate chatbot responses semantically using OpenAI embeddings.
Also validate multilingual behavior: English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL).

parameters.name: testdata
parameters.value: {'prompt_en': 'Hello', 'expected_en': 'Hello! How can I help you today? If you have any questions about government operations, Emirati culture, or need definitions or information, just let me know.'}

parameterValues: {'prompt_en': 'Hello', 'expected_en': 'Hello! How can I help you today? If you have any questions about government operations, Emirati culture, or need definitions or information, just let me know.'}
